text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The Tracen Meet is fast approaching.<n>It's one of the
Academy's regular<n>events, and it features every category<n>
of race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As such, the training grounds are<n>filled with students
practicing, eager to<n>show off their skills on the day of the<n>
event.
Huff, puff... A-almost... there...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Among them, I see an exhausted<n>Umamusume straggling
far behind the<n>others.
Fiiinish... Wheeze. Urgh... Sodizzy...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
When her body finally gives out and<n>she falls to the ground,
I rush to her<n>side.
Y-yup, all good...

Phew... Can't let a little dizziness get<n>in my way, especially
if I want to win!
But thanks for checking on me! Um...<n>Are you...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In answer to her inquisitive look, I<n>quickly introduce myself
as a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Whoa, a trainer, huh?! Nice to meet<n>you! I'm Haru Urara!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Wait, that means you're coming to<n>the Tracen Meet, right?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Then make sure you watch my race<n>too! I'm going to take
first place!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Running feels really good! And look at<n>all this energy! Not to
mention how<n>tasty carrots are! I bet I've got this in<n>the
bag!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Haru Urara beams with<n>confidence, I think back to how
she<n>pushed herself to the point of<n>collapse during training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Perhaps she's more talented than my<n>first impression?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I better get back to training!<n>See you at the race!
Bye-bye!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff... Why are my legs soheeeavy!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: With a strained cry, Haru Urara<n>dashes off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On the day of the event, curious to<n>see Haru Urara's
performance, I<n>make my way to her assigned<n>racecourse.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We've entered the final stretch! Haru<n>Urara continues to lag
farther and<n>farther behind the pack!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hnnngh! I'm not giving up yet!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And across the line! What a close<n>race! We've got a photo
finish on our<n>hands!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even as every other runner passes<n>the finish line, Haru
Urara continues to<n>run with all her might, eyes fixed on<n>the
goal.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: That's it! I'm almost there! And...<n>Yah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Now Haru Urara... has finally passed<n>the finish line! A round
of applause for<n>her, folks!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Dead last... Judging from her form, I<n>know she's not
injured or sick. This<n>really is the best she can do...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While disappointed, I can't seem to<n>get the image of Haru
Urara running<n>with all her might out of my mind.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huff... Wheeze... S-so tired...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ah, you're that trainer from before!<n>You really came to
watch me run!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe... This is embarrassing. I<n>thought I was gonna win for
sure this<n>time...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
But guess what?! I ran the whooole<n>race! All that training
really paid off!
choice_data_list: I could tell you ran with everything you've got.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Really?! Ehehe, I sure did!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Running really is the best! I can't wait<n>for my next race!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ah, now that I think about it, I'll be<n>running in the next tryout
race too!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you should come watch me race<n>there too! I'll make
sure to take first<n>place then!
choice_data_list: All right. I'll see you there.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Great! Then it's a promise!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, looks like I've got more<n>practice ahead of me! Go,
me, go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite tasting bitter defeat, Haru<n>Urara's eyes are filled
not with<n>sorrow, but overwhelming<n>determination.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Facing her relentless optimism, I too<n>am filled with a strong
desire to see<n>her race again.
